msContents.summary:
A multiple-text manuscript containing two Dharmaśāstra works copied for Ducler in 1830-1831 by Śorakkuḍi [Tamil Curakkuṭi] Kṛṣṇaśasāstrin:
an incomplete Mitākṣarā (Adhyāya 2 only, that is the Vyavahārādhyāya) (U1)
the Vyavahāranirṇaya by Varadarāja (U3, f155v), apparently preceded by an unidentified work (U3, f149r)

collation.desc: 148 folios = Mitākṣarā, Vyavahārādhyāya. Tamil foliation [1]-148. Parallel Arabic foliation 149-287.
1 folio = guard leaf. No foliation. Blank recto verso.
139 folios = Vyavahāranirṇaya. Tamil foliation [1]-139. Parallel Arabic foliation 149-287.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil foliation [1]-148 for U1, [1]-139 for U3. Continuous parallel Arabic foliation 1-287 for U1 and U3. No foliation for U2.

additions.desc: Tamil letter ṇa engraved (front cover, verso and back cover, recto).
BnF shelfmark sticker: SANSCRIT 815 (back cover, verso). Pasted over another sticker, which looks like a Burnouf's sticker.

origin.origDate: Internally dated to the year vikṛti of the Jovian cycle, that is, CE 1830-1831. See colophons (U1, f148v2 and U3, f278r1).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Philippe Ducler. See BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848, no. 92.

listBibl.bibl: Mitākṣarā (2020). GRETIL e-text. Vijñāneśvara: Mitākṣarā, a commentary on the Yājñavalkya-dharmaśāstra. http://gretil.sub.uni-goettingen.de/gretil/corpustei/transformations/html/sa_vijJAnezvara-mitAkSarA.htm
Vyavahāranirṇaya (1942). Vyavahāranirnaya of Varadarāja. Ed. K. V. Rangaswami Aiyangar and A. N. Krishna Aiyangar. Madras: Adyar Library.

Burnouf, Eugène (1832). “Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique.” Journal asiatique 10, p. 84-91. — See p. 90, no. 36.

Cabaton, A. (1907). Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits sanscrits et pālis. 1er fascicule. Manuscrits sanscrits. Bibliothèque Nationale, Département des manuscrits.. Paris: Leroux. — See p. 134, no. 815.
Rodet, Léon & Feer, Léon (1872-). Catalogue des manuscrits sanscrits en écriture grantha. Manuscript, BnF Sanscrit 1775.1. — See f. 4r, no. 3.
